movie_title: Nature destroying nature: BBC News Review
introduction: Non-native animals and plants are destroying biodiversity and ecosystems across the world. A major s

vocabulary.definition: the variety of plant and animal life in a particular habitat or ecosystem
vocabulary.example: Conservation efforts are crucial to protect the biodiversity of the rainforest.

vocabulary.definition: introducing or causing damage in an environment where they are not native
vocabulary.example: The invasive species of plants are disrupting the natural balance of the ecosystem.

vocabulary.definition: to force something away from you or keep it at a distance
vocabulary.example: The strong smell of the repellent repelled the mosquitoes from biting her.

vocabulary.definition: involving serious risks and potential great rewards or losses
vocabulary.example: The negotiations were high-stakes as they determined the future of the company.
Rumors were running rife in the office, causing panic among the employees.

vocabulary.definition: never done or known before; unparalleled
vocabulary.example: The company achieved unprecedented success with their latest product launch.
